actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A resolution with respect to compliance of the Soviet Union with the Convention on Prohibition of Biological weapons.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should: (1) request the Soviet Union to exchange scientific data regarding the outbreak of pulmonary anthrax near Sverdlovsk as provided for by the convention prohibiting bacteriological (biological) and toxin weapons; or (2) take appropriate international procedures or lodge a complaint with the United Nations Security Council, if the Soviet Union fails to make available such data.

titles.title: A resolution with respect to compliance of the Soviet Union with the Convention on Prohibition of Biological weapons.
